title: American importers and consumers bear the cost of 2025 tariffs: analysis
aiHeadline: American importers and consumers are footing the bill for 2025 tariffs, proving that sometimes the only thing more predictable than taxes is getting stuck with someone else's financial mess.

title: A decentralized peer-to-peer messaging application that operates over Bluetooth
author: no_creativity_
aiHeadline: A decentralized peer-to-peer messaging app over Bluetooth is here to make your life just a little bit more complicated, because who doesn't love a good tech niche?

title: Radboud University selects Fairphone as standard smartphone for employees
author: ardentsword
aiHeadline: Radboud University has decided that Fairphone is the new black, proving once again that sometimes the most ethical choice is also the most inconvenient one.

title: Amazon is ending all inventory commingling as of March 31, 2026
author: MrBuddyCasino
aiHeadline: Amazon is ending all inventory commingling as of March 31, 2026, which is basically Amazon saying, 'We’re done sharing, and you’re welcome.'

title: Letter from a Birmingham Jail (1963)
author: hn_acker
aiHeadline: The Letter from a Birmingham Jail (1963) is still making waves, proving that sometimes the best way to make a point is to write it down and let history do the rest.
